Welcome

Welcome to the Migration for 8.0. There are 2 modes, User Migration and Server Migration.

User Mode is for migrating one user. The source is either an Outlook user profile, or a PST file. After entering configuration and options information, you can migrate the user.

Server Mode is for migrating users from an Exchange Server. After entering configuration and options information, you choose selected Exchange users. You also have the option of scheduling users.
